artist: Artist: Takahashi Hiroaki; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: Mt. Fuji in background; yellow thatch roofs of a village in middle ground beyond water at base of mountain; figure wearing a round straw hat and blue checked garment leading a horse with a pack on its back covered in a green and yellow cloth in foreground; trees at left and right; received attached to mount sheet and framed
inscription:
Inscription

LLC on mount, in black: [(three untranslated characters) / - Yuichi Saito]; LRC on mount, in black: [(five untranslated characters) / Yoshitaka Aso.]
title: Fujinuma
